source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a snowy, subarctic landscape at twilight. The primary motion is the movement of clouds drifting across the sky as the light changes on the horizon. The buildings and snow-covered ground remain static throughout the shot.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a snowy, subarctic landscape at twilight. The primary motion is the movement of clouds drifting across the sky as the light changes on the horizon. The buildings and snow-covered ground remain static throughout the shot.
